title: Stories of the Border Marches
author: Lang, John
snippet: They were angry men, the Peeblesshire hill farmers,that summer of 1762, angry and sore puzzled, for up Manor Water and theLeithen, by Glensax Burn and the Quair, and over the hills intoSelkirkshire, the tale was ever the same, sheep gone, and never a traceof them to be found.
